title: Album Font
content:
Hey - does anyone know what font this is?

Thanks so much.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200643im_/http:/typophile.com/files/url_3909.jpeg)
author: hisig998

comments.content: looks like [Caslon 540 Swash Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20131020200643/http:/www.ascenderfonts.com/font/caslon-540-swash-italic.aspx) mixed with (presumably) a standard Caslon. ?
